Calendar.LastPirate: The 34th of Sejna by The Marauder.

Weather.Sunset: The World is engulfed by the night.
Weather.HeavyFog: The cheerful chirping of birds carries on the springtime breeze.
Weather.BeautifulDay: The sun shines down on the blooming flowers.
Weather.BrightSun: The sun shines across the land.
Weather.GlaringSun: Thunderstorms roll in from the Crystal Bay.
Weather.Heat: A hot sun dries the morning dew.
Weather.Still: The air is chillingly calm and quiet.
Weather.LightBreeze: A chilly wind sweeps down out of the Dragonhold Mountains.
Weather.StrongWind: Strong winds cross the Crystal Bay.
Weather.WindGusts: Screams of the dead can be heard from Caladon.
Weather.GaleForce: Gale force winds blow in from Crystal Bay.
Weather.ClearSkies: The sky is clear blue from horizon to horizon.
Weather.LightClouds: Light clouds cover the snowy peaks of the Firedrake Mountains.
Weather.LightRain: A light drizzle covers weary travelers.
Weather.HeavyRain: Blood falls from the sky in the Blood Steppes.
Weather.SheetsRain: Sheets of chilling rain fall from the sky.
Weather.TorrentRain: Torrential rains pour from the heavens.
Weather.NoMoon: The moon is swallowed by the night.
Weather.SliverMoon: Howls of werewolves can be heard from the hills.
Weather.HalfMoon: Demons scream at the half moon in the night sky.
Weather.WaxingMoon: A blood red moon lights the night sky.
Weather.FullMoon: A full moon illuminates the night.
